text: Niscaya yara sesaba bisaya gopana kare, ya allaha kitabe nayila karechena ebam sejan'ya alpa mulya grahana kare, tara aguna chara nijera pete ara kichu'i dhukaya na. Ara allaha keyamatera dina tadera sathe na katha balabena, na tadera pabitra kara habe, bastutah tadera jan'ye rayeche bedanadayaka ayaba.
